locations.description: A big, brand-new lifting and weights facility. Purpose-built for serious strength training with top-of-the-line equipment and plenty of space to move.

locations.name: Frontline Fitness — Grantham
locations.description: The home of functional fitness — built for Hyrox, ATHX, and everything in between. If you want to push your limits with real-world movement and competition-ready training, this is the place.
